# speed

**Instance Property**

The rate of playback for an audio mix group.

## Declaration

```swift
var speed: Double
```

## Discussion

The system limits the rate of playback to the range of `[0.25, 4]`. The default speed is `1`, which is equivalent to a normal playback rate.
title: speed
